modName: Quieter Ice Spike and Icy Spear spells
summary: Reduces the Ice Spike and Icy Spear casting sound to a bearable level
descriptionHtml:
[center][i]If you ever clenched your teeth or winced at the sound of your character (or a nearby NPC!) casting Ice Spike or Ice Spear (headphones users know this pain), then this simple mod is for you.[/i]

[img width=481,height=310]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/23321/23321-1520330766-1798677756.jpeg[/img]ï»¿[/center]

The volume of those spells is brought down to approximately the sound level of the basic Flame spell.
Kudos to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/4690586]SumGhai[/url] for the request of this modification.

[size=4][color=yellow][b][u]MANUAL INSTALLATION:[/u][/b][/color][/size] Extract in Skyrim folder.
[size=4][color=yellow][b][u]NMM INSTALLATION:[/u][/b][/color][/size] Just click download! Easy peasy.

----------------------------------------------------------------

In a similar fashion, see [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1624]Quieter Ironflesh Stoneflesh Oakflesh Spells[/url] by larpster.

----------------------------------------------------------------

[color=yellow][b][u]My other works:[/u][/b][/color]

> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20841]Quieter unsheathe, draw Sword, Bound Sword and Dagger[/url]
> [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21084]FIXED Hybrids Vicious Weapon Pack[/url]

----------------------------------------------------------------
author: Yaushee aka Mastata
